name: Haunted Theme Park Hidden Object – Mystery Amusement Parks Pic Puzzle Objects Spot Differences
name_original: Haunted Theme Park Hidden Object – Mystery Amusement Parks Pic Puzzle Objects Spot Differences
description:
Hidden Objects – Haunted Amusement & Theme Parks is an artistically crafted seek and find game with 30+ Eerie and Mysterious Levels. FREE ZOMBIE ARCADE MINI GAME!

Find Hidden Objects in Vacant Amusement Parks. Explore the Shadowy Theme Parks of No More!

Discover the Mystery of Abandoned Theme Parks with Vacant Roller Coasters, Crumbling Ferris Wheels, Old Rides, Rusted Bumper Cars, Vacant Parking Lots, Broken-down Trains, Ramshackle Buildings and Rickety Boats. Take an Eerie Trek Exploring Haunted Amusement Parks!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

Haunted Amusement & Theme Parks is full of mysterious Adventures waiting for you!

Hidden Objects – Haunted Amusement & Theme Parks features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics with Haunting Themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Explore the Shadowy Theme Parks of No More
Free Zombie Bonus Game!

Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
